title: X2 - The Threat by LimEJET
description:
OK! My second torrent! Seeding won\&#039;t begin immediately, I\&#039;m losing my Internet connection for two weeks T_T

X2 - The Threat is a space-simulation in first person.
\&#039;
It\&#039;s been called the \"21:st century Elite\" by PC zone.

This baby is updated to the latest version (1.4) and has the OFFICIAL No-CD-patch installed (Seems weird, I know, but they actually made one). No installation is needed, just download and play. Just double-click X2.exe in the folder to start.

Some of my save files is in there, my mistake.

There may even be some files for the editor and mod creator tool in there, I\&#039;m not sure... If not, I\&#039;ll upload those too. 

___________________________________________________________________________________
                              SHAPE THE UNIVERSE

                               

The ultimate test of combat, tactical, navigational & entrepreneurial skills, X2 The Threat is a space simulation of breathtaking depth & scope.

Explore a vast, dynamic universe, populated with thousands of spacecraft, stations and satellites. Build a lucrative empire by trading in a huge variety of goods. form fleets of spacecraft, limited only by what you can afford and fight gripping battles from the cockpit, gunner\&#039;s seat or remotely from afar.
__________________________________________________________________________________
Oh yeah, the manual is like 200 pages. You can probably download it from www.replacementdocs.com , though.

Have fun you guys ^^
